pr_title: Add ability to configure proxy host and port

timeline.bodyText: the valid port range is 0-65535, shouldn't IntegerRange be renamed to PortsRange? (also additional validations should be added)
timeline.author: valfirst

replies.bodyText: The IntegerRange itself I wanted to make generic, as to port verification that's verified in underlying layer by java.net.InetSocketAddress.checkPort(int)
replies.author: uarlouski

replies.bodyText: agree, it's better to check ports before they are pulled from the ports pool
replies.author: uarlouski
